nodes.text: The Mos Espa orphanage was a childcare institution in Mos Espa, the city on the Outer Rim planet Tatooine.

During the Life Day festivities of 1 ABY, the orphanage received a donation of 10,000 credits from stormtrooper TK-555. TK-555 who had unknowingly stolen candy destined for poor children felt remorseful, and was pressured into donating to the orphanage by an unidentified spacer.
